ModMetaData.name: Smokeleaf Bazooka
ModMetaData.author: MrP
ModMetaData.description:
Now introducing the Smokeleaf Bazooka! 

 This bazooka features a single round of concentrated smokeleaf. Caution friends, this isn't just your average smokeleaf high - it's a concentrated EXTREME high. Your enemies will be left incredibly high, uncomfortably so! 

 Unless, they are already an avid smokeleaf user - at which point they will just feel a normal high.
